org.concordia.kingdoms
Interface Game<T extends ICoordinate>

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractGame, Kingdoms
public interface Game<T extends ICoordinate>

The user of this interface has precise control over the game. The control like starting the game, resuming, saving and exit the game

Since:
1.0
Author:
Team K

Method Summary
 void exit()
          gets out of the game
 String getDescription()
           
 String getName()
           
 void resume(File file)
          resumes the game from the file having the game state
 void save()
          saves the game state, so that the same can be reloaded
 void start(List<Player<T>> players)
          starts the game
